Check whether the given version of Stats is compatible with Autorank

Parameters:
version - version of Stats that is running on this system.
Returns:
true if compatible; false otherwise

Get the stats of a player, a new stat will be created if it didn't exist yet.

Parameters:
statType - StatType to get from the player
player - Player to get the stats of.
Returns:
Requested stat of the player

getBlocksStat

public int getBlocksStat(java.lang.String playerName,
                         int id,
                         int damageValue,
                         org.bukkit.World world,
                         java.lang.String statType)
Gets the total blocks of a certain id and damage value placed/broken

Parameters:
playerName - Player to check for
id - Item ID to check for
damageValue - Damage value to check for. (negative number to not skip check)
world - World to check in. Null for global.
statType - Either "Block break" or "Block place"
Returns:
amount player placed/broke of a block
